text: Name-ye Khosrowan (, The Book of Khosrows/Kings) is a historical book written by the Qajar prince, Jalal al-Din Mirza Qajar between 1868 and 1872 CE. Name- ye Khosrowan includes history of Iran, from the ancient times to the Zand dynasty. == References == Category:Iranian nationalism Category:Persian books Category:Iranian books
title: Name-ye Khosrowan
